name: albacore
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large type of tuna (= a large fish that lives in warm seas, often eaten as food): The Fisheries Commission will govern the management of four tuna species: skipjack, albacore, bigeye, and yellowfin. All canned white tuna is albacore. Compare
bluefin tuna
skipjack tuna
yellowfin tuna
More examplesFewer examplesThey tagged albacore in the region as part of a biological study.This large parasite is easily identified in albacore.Albacore are unique among tuna in that their primary food source is cephalopods.Thunnus alalunga is albacore tuna.
